amendment.description: To require the Secretary of Defense to conduct a feasibility study and cost estimate for a pilot program that uses predictive analytics and screening to identify mental health risk and provide early, targeted intervention for part-time members of the reserve components of the Armed Forces.

vote.text: Amendment SA 903 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Amendment SA 903 proposed by Senator Reed for Senator Leahy to Amendment SA 1003. (consideration: CR S5787; text: CR S5789) To require the Secretary of Defense to conduct a feasibility study and cost estimate for a pilot program that uses predictive analytics and screening to identify mental health risk and provide early, targeted intervention for part-time members of the reserve components of the Armed Forces.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 903 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 903 proposed by Senator Reed for Senator Leahy to Amendment SA 1003.
